divs: Sighting Detailsok well this is wat i took maybe like 30 to 45 mins later after i saw the shiny star like object ....... it looks like a flock of seagulls an they are rilly rilly high up weir i saw the object.. an it looks like their circleing around a dark cigar shape.. it could be a seagulle but it dosent look like the seagulls around it .. idk check it out!!! the other pic weir the pol is at well to the right of it u need to zoom in an u can see the seagulls an thats weir i saw the shiny star like object...
Summary: I was looking out the window
